gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 129, Cavaliers 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Cavaliers, 129-96. Kyle Lowry recorded a season-high 28 points to go along with three assists for the Heat, with Jaime Jaquez adding a career-high 22 points and eight rebounds off the bench in the victory. Craig Porter tallied 16 points and five assists for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 9-5 in the regular season, while the Cavaliers fall to 8-6.
